name: Starlight: Celestial Beginnings
description:
Many centuries ago, it is said that the world of Enchancia was in peril. Chaos filled the land and the Great Star which is now known as the Sun went black as night. The people of Enchancia were in need of a miracle... The Great Celestial who many people believed watched over and protected the people of Enchancia, sent five brave mages of different elements. They were told to cast a spell in unison and they did. Those Mages sacrificed themselves that day to restore light to the Great Star. 

The Celestial also created my family's great ancestors. Unlike the rest of the Mages who can only cast one element, our family can learn and cast all the elements making us the most powerful mages in all of Enchancia. Most of my family is gone... my sister and I are really the only ones left to protect the stars.

My name is Eliot by the way. 

These are my two friends:

Luna:

and Nash

and this is my sister Aria.

Together... I believe...

WE CAN DO ANYTHING!

But honestly... first, we need someone like you to hear our story. We worked really hard to tell it... so what are you waiting for?

Hit that download button and start playing Starlight: Celestial Beginnings!
